gameDetails.name: Doomed Battalions: ASL Module 11
gameDetails.description:
Doomed Battalions is the Allied Minor extension to the Advanced Squad Leader game system.[...]

Doomed Battalions contains:

    3 8" x 22" geomorphic mapboards (9, 44, and 45) (1st-2nd edition) / 5 8" x 22" geomorphic mapboards (9, 11, 33, 44, and 45) (3rd-4th  edition)
    3 countersheets (2nd edition) / 4 countersheets (3rd-4th edition)
    8 ASL scenarios (1st-2nd edition) / 24 ASL scenarios (3rd edition) / 32 ASL scenarios (4th edition)
    Chapter H notes for the Allied Minors
    Overlays OW1, RR1-RR14, X19-X24 (3 sheets in 4th edition)
    20 replacement rules pages for Chapter A & B (4th edition)
    updated National Capabilities Chart (4th edition)


3rd & 4th edition note: this edition contains both Doomed Battalions (1st-2nd edition) and The Last Hurrah so the entire Allied Minor OB - infantry, support weapons, guns, and vehicles - is available in one module. 
Includes an additional countersheet and mapboards 11 & 33.

Doomed Battalions is not a complete game, Beyond Valor , the ASL Rulebook, and several other Advanced Squad Leader ASL boards are required for play.
